title: Will 'new' witnesses help Scott Peterson get a new trial?
itunes:title: Will 'new' witnesses help Scott Peterson get a new trial?
description:
An A&E docu-series suggests investigators ignored several witnesses who claimed to have seen Laci Peterson walking her dog at a time that would have excluded Scott Peterson as the killer. Nancy Grace examines the claim with forensics anthropologist Dr. Heather Walsh-Haney, psychologist Dr. Bethany Marshall and RadarOnline reporter Alexis Tereszcuk.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
